attributes.comment:
I would have to say that I too am against the proposed fee increase! It's bad
enough that the total cost of the K1 visa process is nearly $1,000.00 in all. The
government wrongly assumes that every American and or immigrant has money to
throw away. I have news for you, I am the American in the K1 process and I am
supporting myself working 2 jobs as well as going to university in order to obtain a
higher paying job to keep up with higher living costs yearly. Cut the honest folk
some slack, the darn Visa process is hard enough with the paperwork submission
without adding extra stress about fees!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
